remarks: A constant function expressed in terms of its functionality, domain, and value.  See also ~ fconst2 .  (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2004.)  (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)
statement:
fconstfv $p |- ( F : A --> { B } <-> ( F Fn A /\ A. x e. A ( F ` x ) = B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
